snippet: A delegation of British lawmakers visited Iran on Tuesday, the first such trip in years and a reflection of the slowly improving ties between the countries.
abstract: Delegation of British lawmakers led by former Foreign Min Jack Straw visit Iran, first such trip in years and reflection of slowly improving ties between two countries.
lead_paragraph: A delegation of British lawmakers visited Iran on Tuesday, the first such trip in years and a reflection of the slowly improving ties between the countries.

headline.main: Iran: In Thaw, British Lawmakers Visit
